verses.roman:
ei-pañca-madhye eka 'svalpa' yadi haya
subuddhi janera haya kṛṣṇa-premodaya

synonyms: ei—these; pañca-madhye—out of the five; eka—of only one; svalpa—a small quantity; yadi—if; haya—there is; su-buddhi—intelligent; janera—of the person; haya—there is; kṛṣṇa-prema-udaya—awakening of dormant love for Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "One's dormant love for Kṛṣṇa gradually awakens if one is a little advanced in one of these five items and is intelligent.
